company_overview.Name: Arista Networks
company_overview.Description: Arista Networks (formerly Arastra) is an American computer networking company headquartered in Santa Clara, California. The company designs and sells multilayer network switches to deliver software-defined networking (SDN) solutions for large datacenter, cloud computing, high-performance computing, and high-frequency trading environments.
company_overview.Address: 5453 GREAT AMERICA PARKWAY, SANTA CLARA, CA, US
